channel.title: How do I edit the skills like woodcutting, to make them work and give xp?
channel.description:
Im wanting to make my skills work, by people using euqipment with an object and then getting xp in certain skills for example using a bronze axe on a tree, however I don't know how to change the values for the Xp given per tree and also how much xp each level needs to go up by...?
So I would love maybe a link to a tutorial or maybe just a quick tutorial on editing skills here.
Im using testscape by the way.
Thankyou.
Mankk.
